imdb.title: Majin Tantei Nougami Neuro
imdb.plot: Yako Katsuragi is an acclaimed high school detective, who, despite her young age, has solved many cases. In fact, there seems to be no case that she can't solve, or any culprit that escapes justice. But within the walls of her det...

episodes.title: Shoku (Eat)
episodes.plot: High school student Yako Katsuragi is a gourmand whose father recently died mysteriously. Soon after his death, the demon Neuro Nougami, who feasts on mysteries, suddenly arrives from the Demon World.

episodes.title: Shu (Community)
episodes.plot: Yako's best friend Kanae's friend is the latest victim in a string of murders called the "Zero Case". Her friend had been a part of an internet community called Links.

episodes.title: Warai (Poison)
episodes.plot: Kanae invites Yako to go see the popular comedian Taro Manpuku, whose show comes with a bento box. But during his show, several people in the audience collapse and die.

episodes.title: Inu (Dog)
episodes.plot: The next mystery Yako and Neuro tackle is a bombing in a park, plotted by a criminal who goes by the name "Hysterrier".

episodes.title: Kasu (Office)
episodes.plot: Lately, there have been a bizarre string of homicides. The killer, nicknamed "the Slashing Stylist", only targets women with beautiful hair.

episodes.title: Kami (Long Friends)
episodes.plot: Sai the Thief has been brutally murdering people and stuffing their bodies in a box. The biggest puzzle is how he never leaves a trace of evidence.

episodes.title: Hako (Box)
episodes.plot: Sai the Thief has been brutally murdering people and stuffing their bodies in a box. The biggest puzzle is how he never leaves a trace of evidence.

episodes.title: Yume (Future)
episodes.plot: The latest mystery involves a killer who fatally shoots police officers, steals their firearms, and leaves behind a note signed with his self-given nickname, "Cop Killer."

episodes.title: Shime (Tie)
episodes.plot: Aya Asia, the singer who has captivated people around the world, makes a surprise visit to Yako's detective agency and asks them to investigate the mysterious deaths of her producer and manager.

episodes.title: Ichi (Alone)
episodes.plot: Aya's stalker is arrested, but it is determined that he has nothing to do with the deaths of her producer and manager. Yako is getting more and more suspicious of Aya.

episodes.title: Hikari (Limelight)
episodes.plot: The lead actress of a television show is murdered on the set. The suspect is a rival co-star, Kaoruko Noma. Neuro and Yako are called to investigate.

episodes.title: Zou (Statue)
episodes.plot: Neuro and Yako receive a letter from Sai the Thief, announcing his next crime. Sai says he will steal the sculptor Togo Eshiya's last self-portrait statue.

episodes.title: X (Sai)
episodes.plot: Neuro and Yako determine that both the sculptor Eshiya and his widow were murdered, and Yako points to the widow's older brother, Kazushige Maguri.

episodes.title: Tabi (Dream-Like)
episodes.plot: Yako and her co-workers take advantage of a hot springs trip that she won in a raffle. When they are about to go to sleep at the hotel, they hear shouting.

episodes.title: Ryu (Dragon)
episodes.plot: Lake Kijin is rumored to be home to a dinosaur named Kissie. On their way home from the hot springs, Neuro and the gang come across the scene of a fatal car accident.

episodes.title: Haru (Spring)
episodes.plot: The number of criminals who have been taken over by the Digital Drug is increasing.

episodes.title: Ou (Chase)
episodes.plot: Digital HAL is the digital version of Eisuke Harukawa's brain that has been manipulating the Digital Drug.

episodes.title: Kagi (Key)
episodes.plot: Possessed by the Digital Drug, Higuchi operates the second supercomputer and attacks Neuro and Yako.

episodes.title: 2 (Two)
episodes.plot: Neuro and the gang manage to get on the nuclear-powered aircraft carrier that Digital HAL is controlling.

episodes.title: Tsukue (Woman)
episodes.plot: There have been several mysterious deaths recently in which the victims have been killed by neuro toxins upon sticking their heads inside the drawer of their red desk.

episodes.title: Sei (Beauty)
episodes.plot: Neuro and Yako next tackle the investigation of the "Faceless Murder Case". The victim is a female whose face had been completely burned by sulfuric acid.

episodes.title: Onna (Witch)
episodes.plot: Yako's mother, Haruka, has been arrested in South America. Unbeknownst to Neuro, Yako flies overseas and begins investigating into the matter.

episodes.title: Seki (Sai)
episodes.plot: Yako, Mio, and Godai head to Sharato Village to solve the mystery of the local witch that Haruka had been investigating. Meanwhile, Neuro looks into Laritta Jones' murder.

episodes.title: Sai (Sealed)
episodes.plot: A witch judging ceremony has begun inside of the ruins. Yako and Mio have both been forced inside a box.

episodes.title: Sai (Final)
episodes.plot: Neuro's demon powers do not work inside the ruins, and he is near-death as a monstrous Sai the Thief impales him.
